page.title: 17Road Junction,Bradford
page.content: The Greengates junction joins Harrogate Road and New Line in the centre of Greengates village.Some traffic lights control the traffic travelling from Keighley to Leeds and from Bradford to Harrogate.The opinion of pedestrians using the junction is that it is too busy.A shopkeeper reckons that the increase in traffic is partly due to the opening of a large supermarket nearby. Many lorries,cars and buses use the junction every day.Plans have been drawn up to widen the junction yet again which would involve destroying part of the village.We counted 89 cars passing through a certain point in a space of 5 minutes.Some shopkeepers favour a roundabout but others fear this would cut off access to their shops.
